author: Thoughty2
description: The “Lawless Years” in America went from 1921 to 1933, as people flagrantly ignored prohibition laws and gangsters thrived. One such gangster was Al Capone, also known as Scarface, who ruled the outfit in Chicago. He got away with shooting 7 people in 1929 in the infamous Saint Valentine’s Day Massacre and only served 9 months for carrying a concealed weapon due to ‘good behaviour’. Talk about untouchable! That is until, the FBI managed to nail him for tax evasion…
title: If Only Al Capone Had Known About the Cayman Islands!
